title: 1021 W 37th Ave
posting_body: Charming property in fantastic LoHi location!
This home features an adorable front porch, private backyard, downstairs storage area, and several upgrades!
Great location close to LoHi restaurants and parks, paved trail and Denver trail system.
BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 1 full bath (shower) and 2 bedrooms on main level
Refrigerator, stove/oven, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave
HEAT/COOLING: Natural Gas Heating, Central Air
PARKING: 2 spots in front of the property
BASEMENT: No basement but there is a downstairs storage area
Up tp 2 pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.
LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
